knimeNode.name: GeneticBackgroundModel
knimeNode.shortDescription: This node computes frequencies indicating the incidence of variants in a gene or transcript.

fullDescription.intro: This node computes frequencies indicating the incidence of variants in a gene or transcript. Frequencies can be exactly computed for matrix files generated by the VEPSummary node. The node is also able to accurately estimate frequencies in VCF files without individuals genotypes. In both cases, the frequencies can be used as a background model for the analysis of case-control studies (GeneBasedAnalysis and GeneSetAnalysis node).
fullDescription.option: Select frequencies are computed on gene id, gene symbol or transcript level.

option.name: Field IDs indicating the AC and AN to be used

fullDescription.option: Set field IDs of the allele counts (in general AC) and allele numbers (in general AN).

ports.inPort: Input VCF file with VEP annotated variants or matrix file generated by VEPSummary node.
ports.outPort: Cell 0: Path to the resulting background model file.
